full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Request for Information**

### Tender Details

| **Tender Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Title (English) | PostgreSQL Maintenance and Support (M&S) Services and Encryption Solution of PostgreSQL Data at Rest |
| Title (French) | Services de support et de maintenance (M&S) PostgreSQL ET Solution de chiffrement des données PostgreSQL en repos |
| Reference Number | PW-23-01018572 |
| Solicitation Number | 1000427255 |
| Publication Date | 19 January 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | 1 March 2023 13:00:00 |
| Procurement Category | Goods and Services (GD) |
| Proponent Information Contact | Hamza Khangui |
| Email | hamza.khangui@cra-arc.gc.ca |
| Phone | 438-459-7160 |

### Description

This Request for Information (RFI) is issued by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to gather information from vendors providing maintenance and support (M&S) services, as well as encryption functionality for data at rest solutions, for PostgreSQL. The purpose of this RFI is to obtain feedback from potential vendors on their experience, solutions, and requirements for delivering these services.

The following information is requested:

1.  Vendor experience and expertise in delivering M&S services for PostgreSQL
2.  Solutions and services offered for data at rest encryption for PostgreSQL
3.  Requirements and considerations for delivering these services

This RFI is not a formal bid solicitation. It will not necessarily result in a contract, and the CRA will not be obligated to award a contract as a result of the responses received.
